name: Caverns Of Underwood
description:
Built in ancient times by creators unknown. Underwood was assumed to be only a myth.

"Carved through earth and stone.  He rules upon the mighty throne".

You have 10 minutes to find the exit or you will spend eternity wandering the Underworld!

An atmospheric first person fantasy maze crawler. For reference this game is 400% larger than Dimsheller Maze and more much more elaborate. Featuring lots of different textures and lighting. With 2 paths to the exit! There's a few hidden points of interest along the way. Now with the added pressure of time!

PPC and x86 32bit mac support 

Windows 2000 and up

Soundtrack, assets and models all created by me. I don't use 3rd party assets. I believe in making my own unique products.
